phrs.translation: 萨蒂, 沙提, 殉葬
入出息念, 安那般那

sentences.sentence: To develop sati is to shake the knowing element of a person.
sentences.translation: 培养觉性就是在唤醒一个人的觉知元素。

sentences.sentence: If there is no sati at that moment, there can be no panna either.
sentences.translation: 如果在那一刻没有正念，就不可能有智慧。

sentences.sentence: When one has listened to Dhamma and heard about sati, there will be more remembrance of it.
sentences.translation: 当一个人已听闻佛法并听到了正念，将会对此有更多的记忆。
